Given list pivot tables, lpt, flatten_table_list() applies transformation defined function f , merges results flat table. case, full result shown document takes much space, sample shown . flat table, implemented using tibble, can use tidyverse package components transform , shown . case results displayed.
code: f <- function(pt) {   pt |>   set_page(1, 1) |>   remove_top(1) |>   define_labels(n_col = 2, n_row = 2) |>   fill_labels() |>   remove_agg() |>   fill_values() |>   remove_k() |>   replace_dec() |>   unpivot() } folder <- system.file("extdata", "csvfolder", package = "flattabler") lpt <- read_text_folder(folder)  class(lpt[[1]]) #> [1] "pivot_table" ftl <- flatten_table_list(lpt, f) t <- ftl |>   tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = page, values_from = value) |>   dplyr::rename(B = col1, A = col2, E = row1, D = row2) |>    dplyr::select(A, B, D, E, M1, M2, M3, M4) |>    dplyr::arrange(A, B, D, E)

Example: read_text_file(): Reads text file creates pivot_table object. file expected contain one pivot tables. line file corresponds row table; within row, columns defined separator character. file name can included part object attributes. text: Pivot tables generally used present raw summary data. generated spreadsheets , recently, also R (pivottabler). generate pivot tables data, flattabler package necessary. , get data pivot table format need represent analyse using another tool, package can helpful: can save us several hours programming manual transformation. flattabler package offers set operations allow us transform one pivot tables flat table.

text: can install released version flattabler CRAN : development version GitHub :
code: install.packages("flattabler") # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("josesamos/flattabler")

title: Obtaining a Flat Table from Pivot Tables
text: pivot table contains label rows columns, array values, usually numeric data. can contain additional information, table header footer. example pivot table obtained pivottabler package. included flattabler package form variable df_pivottabler, defined data frame. transformation obtain flat table previous pivot table using flattabler package follows: result tibble object can transformed, example, dplyr package remove added data. result obtained follows: defined necessary transformations pivot table, can apply structure. Candidate tables can different number rows columns, depending number labels, must number rows columns labels, number header footer rows, transformations table. easily perform operation, define function f transformations, shown . way can generate flat table list pivot tables. list pivot tables generated using package functions import various data sources.
code: library(flattabler)  ft <- pivot_table(df_pivottabler) |>   define_labels(n_col = 2, n_row = 2) |>   fill_labels() |>   remove_agg() |>   fill_values() |>   unpivot(na_rm = TRUE) ft <- ft |>   dplyr::filter(col2 != "Total") |>   dplyr::filter(row2 != "Total") f <- function(pt) {   pt |>     set_page(1, 1) |>     define_labels(n_col = 2, n_row = 2) |>     remove_top(1) |>     fill_labels() |>     remove_agg() |>     fill_values() |>     remove_k() |>     replace_dec() |>     unpivot() }  folder <- system.file("extdata", "csvfolder", package = "flattabler") lpt <- read_text_folder(folder)  lft <- flatten_table_list(lpt, f)  lft #> # A tibble: 201 × 6 #>    page  col1  col2  row1  row2  value #>    <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> #>  1 M1    b1    a01   e2    d4    1.88  #>  2 M1    b1    a05   e1    d1    1.91  #>  3 M1    b1    a05   e2    d3    1.10  #>  4 M1    b1    a05   e2    d4    2.25  #>  5 M1    b1    a09   e1    d1    2.55  #>  6 M1    b1    a09   e1    d2    2.74  #>  7 M1    b1    a09   e2    d3    3.99  #>  8 M1    b1    a13   e1    d1    2.99  #>  9 M1    b1    a13   e1    d2    1.02  #> 10 M1    b1    a13   e2    d3    3.48  #> # ℹ 191 more rows

title: flattabler 2.1.0
text: Add keep_col_names na_rm parameters unpivot function. Read indicated sheets folder Excel files read_excel_folder().

title: flattabler 2.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-08-09 New data model pivot_table class, vectorial algorithm unpivot(). New examples README vignette.

title: flattabler 1.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-11-15 Change implementation read_excel_sheet(), read_excel_file() read_excel_folder() functions use readxl package. Parameter allSheets obtain sheets Excel files folder: read_excel_folder().

title: flattabler 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-08-10 Functions work directly Excel files: read_excel_sheet(), read_excel_file() read_excel_folder().

title: flattabler 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-06-29 Basic functionality text files.
